title: V Magazine ID font
content:
can anyone identify the type used for V Magazine? thanx in advance.

comments.content:
Check Knockout from HF&J.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---

It's a customized version of Champion from Hoefler

[http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100002](http://web.archive.org/web/20141130150342/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100002 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100002")
